      • getAppointments

        private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointments()
        Gets all appointments filtered based on current options chosen in the UI. The lambda expressions are used to filter the appointments by either the customer or the contact.
        Returns:
        the filtered list of Appointments

        private void setMonthlyTable​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> list)

        public void checkForNum​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
